00017 void WireMap::SetRun(unsigned int run) {
00018   if (run > 0 && run < 100000)
00019     fRun = run;
00020   else
00021     std::cout <<
00022       "WireMap WARNING: Run outside range! (" << run << ")" <<
00023       std::endl;
00024 }
00025 
00026 void WireMap::Enable() {
00027   fEnabled.back() = true;
00028 }
00029 
00030 bool WireMap::Enable(unsigned int i) {
00031   if (i < fEnabled.size())
00032     return (fEnabled[i] = true);
00033   return false;
00034 }
00035 
00036 void WireMap::Disable() {
00037   fEnabled.back() = false;
00038 }
00039 
00040 bool WireMap::Disable(unsigned int i) {
00041   if (i < fEnabled.size())
00042     return !(fEnabled[i] = false);
00043   return false;
00044 }

00046 void WireMap::Add(const char bankname[], const char detname[], bool en, int ped, int pol, int off, double freq) {
00047   std::string bn(bankname);
00048   std::string dn(detname);
00049   Add(bn, dn, en, ped, pol, off, freq);
00050 }
00051  
00052 void WireMap::Add(std::string& bankname, std::string& detname, bool en, int ped, int pol, int off, double freq) {
00053   ++fNDets;
00054   fBankName.push_back(bankname);
00055   fDetName.push_back(detname);
00056   fEnabled.push_back(en);
00057   fPedestal.push_back(ped);
00058   fPolarity.push_back(pol);
00059   fOffset.push_back(off);
00060   fFrequency.push_back(freq);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void WireMap::Add(WireMap& wm, int i) {
00064   ++fNDets;
00065   fBankName.push_back(wm.GetBanks()[i]);
00066   fDetName.push_back(wm.GetDets()[i]);
00067   fEnabled.push_back(wm.GetEnableds()[i]);
00068   fPedestal.push_back(wm.GetPedestals()[i]);
00069   fPolarity.push_back(wm.GetPolarities()[i]);
00070   fOffset.push_back(wm.GetOffsets()[i]);
00071   fFrequency.push_back(wm.GetFrequencies()[i]);
00072 }

00074 void WireMap::UniqueFixes() {
00075   // The UH CAEN had the incorrect sampling
00076   // for runs 2091-2103
00077   double default_freq = 0.;
00078   double freq_fix = 1.6129e7;
00079   if (fRun >= 2091 && fRun <= 2103) {
00080     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < fBankName.size(); ++i) {
00081       if (fBankName[i].substr(0,1) == "C" && fBankName[i].substr(fBankName[i].size() - 2) == "UH") {
00082         while (fFrequency.size() <= i) {
00083           fFrequency.push_back(default_freq);
00084         }
00085         fFrequency[i] = freq_fix;
00086       }
00087     }
00088   }
00089 }

00120 void WireMap::Load(int run_number, const std::string& odb_file) {
00121   static const std::string header("[/Analyzer/WireMap]");
00122   static char tmp[256];
00123 
00124   if (!IsODBFile(odb_file)) {
00125     std::cout <<
00126       "WireMap ERROR: Not recognized as ODB file input! Must be ODB file." <<
00127       std::endl;
00128     return;
00129   }
00130 
00131   Clear();
00132   fRun = run_number;
00133   
00134   // Look through ODB file for appropriate banks
00135   std::ifstream f(odb_file.c_str());
00136   std::string str;
00137   key_t key;
00138   int x;
00139   char c;
00140   double d;
00141   while (f.good()) {
00142     f >> str;
00143     if (str == header) {
00144       while (f.good()) {
00145         f >> str;
00146         key = GetKey(str);
00147         f.getline(tmp, 256);
00148         unsigned int n = 0; // Array size
00149         if (key == BANK) {
00150           n = GetArraySize(tmp);
00151           fBankName.reserve(n);
00152           fNDets = n; // Set number of detectors equal to number of banks
00153           for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00154             f >> str;
00155             if (f.read(tmp, 1).peek() == '\n') // Strings can be null, cause streaming problems
00156               str = "";
00157             else
00158               f >> str;
00159             fBankName.push_back(str);
00160           }
00161         } else if (key == DETECTOR) {
00162           n = GetArraySize(tmp);
00163           fDetName.reserve(n);
00164           for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00165             f >> str;
00166             if (f.read(tmp, 1).peek() == '\n') // Strings can be null, cause streaming problems
00167               str = "";
00168             else
00169               f >> str;
00170             fDetName.push_back(str);
00171           }
00172         } else if (key == ENABLED) {
00173           n = GetArraySize(tmp);
00174           fEnabled.reserve(n);
00175           for (unsigned int i =0; i < n; ++i) {
00176             f >> str >> c;
00177             if (c == 'y') fEnabled.push_back(true);
00178             else if (c == 'n') fEnabled.push_back(false);
00179             else std::cout << "WireMap ERROR: '" << c <<
00180                    "' is not an ODB boolean!" << std::endl;
00181           }
00182         } else if (key == PEDESTAL) {
00183           n = GetArraySize(tmp);
00184           fPedestal.reserve(n);
00185           for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00186             f >> str >> x;
00187             fPedestal.push_back(x);
00188           }
00189         } else if (key == POLARITY) {
00190           n = GetArraySize(tmp);
00191           fPolarity.reserve(n);
00192           for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00193             f >> str >> x;
00194             fPolarity.push_back(x);
00195           }
00196         } else if (key == TIMESHIFT) {
00197           n = GetArraySize(tmp);
00198           fOffset.reserve(n);
00199           for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00200             f >> str >> x;
00201             fOffset.push_back(x);
00202           }
00203         } else if (key == FREQUENCY) {
00204           n = GetArraySize(tmp);
00205           fFrequency.reserve(n);
00206           for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00207             f >> str >> d;
00208             fFrequency.push_back(d);
00209           }
00210         }
00211         // If for some reason haven't got the number of detectors
00212         // from number of banks, then grab the first non-zero
00213         // array sized key from ODB
00214         if (fNDets == 0)
00215           fNDets = n;
00216         // If everything is the right size
00217         // That means everything is finished
00218         if (fNDets != 0 &&
00219             fBankName.size() == fNDets &&
00220             fDetName.size() == fNDets &&
00221             fPedestal.size() == fNDets &&
00222             fPolarity.size() == fNDets &&
00223             fOffset.size() == fNDets &&
00224             fFrequency.size() == fNDets)
00225           return;
00226       }
00227     }
00228   }
00229   // If we get to this point, vectors are not all equal in size
00230   std::cout <<
00231     "WireMap WARNING: Didn't find everything in the ODB! (" <<
00232     odb_file << ")" << std::endl;
00233 
00234 }
00235 
00236 void WireMap::LoadOver(WireMap& wm) {
00237   // Load the new WireMap variables if they exist
00238   // This seems to be how the ODB operates
00239   fRun = wm.GetRun();
00240   fNDets = wm.GetNDets();
00241   if (wm.GetBanks().size() > 0)
00242     fBankName = wm.GetBanks();
00243   if (wm.GetDets().size() > 0)
00244     fDetName = wm.GetDets();
00245   if (wm.GetEnableds().size() > 0)
00246     fEnabled = wm.GetEnableds();
00247   if (wm.GetPedestals().size() > 0)
00248     fPedestal = wm.GetPedestals();
00249   if (wm.GetPolarities().size() > 0)
00250     fPolarity = wm.GetPolarities();
00251   if (wm.GetOffsets().size() > 0)
00252     fOffset = wm.GetOffsets();
00253   if (wm.GetFrequencies().size() > 0)
00254     fFrequency = wm.GetFrequencies();
00255 }

00257 void WireMap::Clear() {
00258   fRun = 0;
00259   fNDets = 0;
00260   fBankName.clear();
00261   fDetName.clear();
00262   fEnabled.clear();
00263   fPedestal.clear();
00264   fPolarity.clear();
00265   fOffset.clear();
00266   fFrequency.clear();
00267 }
00268 
00269 void WireMap::ResizeToBanks() {
00270   static const std::string default_det("blank");
00271   static const bool default_en = false;
00272   static const int default_ped = 0;
00273   static const int default_pol = 1;
00274   static const int default_off = 0;
00275   static const double default_freq = 0.;
00276 
00277   fNDets = fBankName.size();
00278   // Trim down
00279   while (fDetName.size() > fNDets)
00280     fDetName.pop_back();
00281   while (fEnabled.size() > fNDets)
00282     fEnabled.pop_back();
00283   while (fPedestal.size() > fNDets)
00284     fPedestal.pop_back();
00285   while (fPolarity.size() > fNDets)
00286     fPedestal.pop_back();;
00287   while (fOffset.size() > fNDets)
00288     fOffset.pop_back();
00289   while (fFrequency.size() > fNDets)
00290     fFrequency.pop_back();
00291   // Bulk up
00292   while (fDetName.size() < fNDets)
00293     fDetName.push_back(default_det);
00294   while (fEnabled.size() < fNDets)
00295     fEnabled.push_back(default_en);
00296   while (fPedestal.size() < fNDets)
00297     fPedestal.push_back(default_ped);
00298   while (fPolarity.size() < fNDets)
00299     fPolarity.push_back(default_pol);
00300   while (fOffset.size() < fNDets)
00301     fOffset.push_back(default_off);
00302   while (fFrequency.size() < fNDets)
00303     fFrequency.push_back(default_freq);
00304 }
00305 
00306 bool WireMap::AreThereDuplicates() {
00307   unsigned int n = 0;
00308   if (fEnabled.size() < fDetName.size()) {
00309     std::cout << "WireMap WARNING: Array of enabled information is smaller than " <<
00310       "                 array of detector name information." << std::endl;
00311     n = fEnabled.size();
00312   } else if (fEnabled.size() > fDetName.size()) {
00313     std::cout << "WireMap WARNING: Array of enabled information is larger than " <<
00314       "array of detector name information." << std::endl;
00315     n = fDetName.size();
00316   }
00317 
00318   // If two channels are both the same detector and
00319   // both enabled, return true because there is a problem.
00320   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00321     for (unsigned int j = i + 1; j < n; ++j)
00322       if (fDetName[i] == fDetName[j] &&
00323           fEnabled[i] == fEnabled[j])
00324         return true;
00325 
00326   return false;
00327 }
00328 
00329 void WireMap::ClearDisabledDuplicateDetectors() {
00330   static const std::string default_det("blank");
00331   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < fDetName.size(); ++i) {
00332     for (unsigned int j = i + 1; j < fDetName.size(); ++j) {
00333       if (fDetName[i] == fDetName[j]) {
00334         if (j < fEnabled.size() && !fEnabled[j]) {
00335           fDetName[j] = default_det;
00336         } else if (i < fEnabled.size() && !fEnabled[i]) {
00337           fDetName[i] = default_det;
00338         } else {
00339           std::cout << "WireMap ERROR: Couldn't determine which detector " << fDetName[i] <<
00340             " to remove in run " << fRun << "!" << std::endl;
00341         }
00342       }
00343     }
00344   }
00345 }
00346 
00347 bool WireMap::IsODBFile(const std::string& fname) {
00348   return ".odb" == fname.substr(fname.size() - 4);
00349 }
00350 
00351 int WireMap::GetArraySize(const char (&tmp)[256]) {
00352   // Get # of detectors from line in ODB of the form
00353   // VARIBALE = TYPE[#] :
00354   std::string str(tmp);
00355   std::stringstream ss;
00356   int n;
00357   int pos[2];
00358 
00359   pos[0] = str.find('[') + 1;
00360   pos[1] = str.find(']');
00361   str = str.substr(pos[0], pos[1] - pos[0]);
00362   ss << str;
00363   ss >> n;
00364 
00365   return n;
00366 }

00403 
00404 WireMap::key_t WireMap::GetKey(std::string& key) {
00405   static const std::string bankname_key("BankName");
00406   static const std::string detname_key("DetectorName");
00407   static const std::string enabled_key("Enabled");
00408   static const std::string polarity_key("TriggerPolarity");
00409   static const std::string pedestal_key("Pedestal");
00410   static const std::string offset_key("TimeShift");
00411   static const std::string frequency_key("SamplingFrequency");
00412 
00413   if (key == bankname_key)
00414     return BANK;
00415   else if (key == detname_key)
00416     return DETECTOR;
00417   else if (key == enabled_key)
00418     return ENABLED;
00419   else if (key == polarity_key)
00420     return POLARITY;
00421   else if (key == pedestal_key)
00422     return PEDESTAL;
00423   else if (key == offset_key)
00424     return TIMESHIFT;
00425   else if (key == frequency_key)
00426     return FREQUENCY;
00427   return UNKNOWN;
00428 }

00494 
00495 void WireMap::Print() {
00496   using namespace std;
00497   stringstream ss;
00498   std::vector<unsigned int> sizes;
00499   sizes.push_back(fBankName.size());
00500   sizes.push_back(fDetName.size());
00501   sizes.push_back(fEnabled.size());
00502   sizes.push_back(fPedestal.size());
00503   sizes.push_back(fPolarity.size());
00504   sizes.push_back(fOffset.size());
00505   sizes.push_back(fFrequency.size());
00506 
00507   unsigned int n = sizes[0];
00508   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < sizes.size(); ++i)
00509     if (sizes[i] > n)
00510       n = sizes[i];
00511 
00512   cout << left;
00513   cout << setw(24) << "Run Number:" << fRun << endl;
00514   cout << setw(24) << "Number of detectors:" << fNDets << endl;
00515   
00516   ss << "Bank (" << fBankName.size() << ")";
00517   cout << setw(11) << ss.str(); ss.str(string());
00518   ss << "Detector (" << fDetName.size() << ")";
00519   cout << setw(15) << ss.str(); ss.str(string());
00520   ss << "Enabled (" << fEnabled.size() << ")";
00521   cout << setw(14) << ss.str(); ss.str(string());
00522   ss << "Pedestal (" << fPedestal.size() << ")";
00523   cout << setw(15) << ss.str(); ss.str(string());
00524   ss << "Polarity (" << fPolarity.size() << ")";
00525   cout << setw(15) << ss.str(); ss.str(string());
00526   ss << "TimeShift (" << fOffset.size() << ")";
00527   cout << setw(16) << ss.str(); ss.str(string());
00528   ss << "Frequency (" << fFrequency.size() << ")";
00529   cout << setw(16) << ss.str(); ss.str(string());
00530 
00531   cout << endl;
00532   cout << setfill('-') << setw(98) << '-' << setfill(' ') << endl;
00533   cout << setfill(' ') << right;
00534   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00535     cout << setw(11);
00536     if (i < fBankName.size()) cout << fBankName[i];
00537     else cout << ' ';
00538     cout << setw(15);
00539     if (i < fDetName.size()) cout << fDetName[i];
00540     else cout << ' ';
00541     cout << setw(14);
00542     if (i < fEnabled.size()) cout << (fEnabled[i] ? 'y' : 'n');
00543     else cout << ' ';
00544     cout << setw(15);
00545     if (i < fPedestal.size()) cout << fPedestal[i];
00546     else cout << ' ';
00547     cout << setw(15);
00548     if (i < fPolarity.size()) cout << (fPolarity[i] == -1 ? '-' : '+');
00549     else cout << ' ';
00550     cout << setw(16);
00551     if (i < fOffset.size()) cout << -fOffset[i];
00552     else cout << ' ';
00553     cout << setw(16);
00554     if (i < fFrequency.size()) cout << fFrequency[i];
00555     else cout << ' ';
00556     cout << endl;
00557   }
00558 }
